bug.author: TOsmanov
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: cancel "multiple paste" results in a locked workspace
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
Workspace is not blocked after cancel "multiple paste". <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
If you cancel the multiple paste then the workspace is blocked. <denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Copy an object using "ctrl + c" Insert an object using "ctrl+v" Hold "ctrl" for multiple paste Insert object (left-click) Do not insert an next object but press "Esc"

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TOsmanov>@TOsmanov</denchmark-link> , please confirm that the problem was resolved.
